casebody.data:
State
v.
Mark Wayne Ballard 125P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

*382Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

Mark Wayne Ballard, Pro Se.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of April 2016 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
